CustomField.description: Status of the Cache. NOT_STARTED is by default when we insert a record. We will change it to IN_PROGRESS after sending the pre-fetch request and mark it as COMPLETED when we receive the prefetched data.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Status of the Cache. NOT_STARTED is by default when we insert a record. We will change it to IN_PROGRESS after sending the pre-fetch request and mark it as COMPLETED when we receive the prefetched data.
CustomField.label: Status
